title: Dollar Posts First Weekly Gain Since January on Haven Demand
description: The dollar posted its first weekly gain since early January, buoyed by haven demand amid broader market turmoil.
content: The dollar posted its first weekly gain since early January, buoyed by haven demand amid broader market turmoil.
